channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-10929] Change ScanQueryMatcher to use Cells instead of KeyValue.
item.summary: Change ScanQueryMatcher to use Cells instead of KeyValue.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Will take this patch in once HBASE-7319 gets in. So combining all this with HBASE-10801 should ensure that we speed up the reads with DBEs. Also before doing that would ensure that we don't convert the Cell to KV any where in the StoreFile layer. Ideally its better we convert to Kv only in the HRegion layer, so that we get the max performance gain.

Ping !!!
Ping!!
Will commit this unless objections. See HBASE-10801 for comments on performance.

lgtm


-            kv = KeyValueUtil.ensureKeyValue(f.transformCell(kv));

+            kv = f.transformCell(kv);

transformCell() returns Cell. Please add a new variable of type Cell.
Replaces all variable names kv with cell. Will commit this tomorrow morning my time unless there are objections.

This message is automatically generated.
Can i commit the latest patch?
I skimmed v4. lgtm.
Committed to trunk. Thanks for the review Stack.

Belated +1. Nice change.
Had been thinking to remove the manual ripping-apart of the KVs done by SQM, never got to it. Glad to see that is has no performance impact... Although... Speaking of the numbers in HBASE-10801: With a large value portion (1000 bytes) we're obviously not going to see performance changes in small keys.

SUCCESS: Integrated in HBase-TRUNK #5107 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/5107/)
HBASE-10929-Change ScanQueryMatcher to use Cells instead of KeyValue.(Ram) (ramkrishna: rev 1589018)

  • /hbase/trunk/hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/ReversedStoreScanner.java
  • /hbase/trunk/hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/ScanQueryMatcher.java
  • /hbase/trunk/hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/StoreScanner.java
I would like to commit this addendum too. Its better we get the qualifierOffset and qualifierLength prior rather than getting it every time in case of KeyValue format.
+1 on addendum. Makes sense.
Committed the addendum. Thanks for the review.

SUCCESS: Integrated in HBase-TRUNK #5112 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/5112/)
HBASE-10929 - Addendum that extracts out qualifierOffset, qualifierLength and timestamp (ramkrishna: rev 1589590)

  • /hbase/trunk/hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/ScanQueryMatcher.java
Closing this issue after 0.99.0 release.
